name: Rios
description:
Rios named after Ocho Rios in Jamaica a small town known for its tourism and sandy beaches. Bringing the flavour of the west indies to the upper class presented with sassy exotic sides.
Contemporary Jamaican food to spark and design tapestries on your pallet.

team.name: Leon Bartlett
team.bioHtml: Founder @Only Blanc Noir • Worked at @donebymonday

jobs.title: CEO
jobs.description: Commitment - means working holidays and odd hours oversees almost every aspect of the business. Education - degree from a university in hospitality and hotel management is ideal. Leadership - CEO has to be in control of all aspects of the restaurant at once. Employee and Customer Duties - knowledge of all aspects of the restaurant, this means knowing what all your employees do, as well as who they are. Great people skills and knowledge of the restaurant business is essential with strong ethics, Grace and Dignity.
